isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - WIPER PIVOT WITH ELECTRIC COWL MOUNTED WIPERS

svcproc.title: WIPER PIVOT WITH ELECTRIC COWL MOUNTED WIPERS

svcprocinfo.para: Refer to Figure 107 for Items in parentheses.

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. MOUNTING SCREWS 115 TO 140 IN-LBS. (13 TO 16 NM)

step1.para: If the wiper motor is removed, continue; if not, remove the wiper motor. Refer to ELECTRIC WIPER MOTOR (COWL MOUNTED), Remove.
Remove the wiper arm and blade (Item 5) from the wiper pivot assembly (Item 1). Use appropriate pulling tool. Remove washer hose (Item 7) from the fitting (Item 6) on the wiper pivot assembly.

Remove four screws (Item 2) that secure the wiper pivot assembly (Item 1) to the cowl. Slowly pull the linkage of the wiper pivot assembly up and out of the cowl opening. Be careful not to damage the weather seal (Item 4). Remove the washer hose from the wiper pivot assembly fitting underneath.

Check weather seal (Item 4) for damage. If damaged, replace it. Insert the linkage of the wiper pivot assembly (Item 1) into the opening in the cowl. Position wiper pivot assembly over the cowl opening. Reconnect washer hose underneath and place it on the cowl. Install 4 screws (Item 2) that secure wiper pivot assembly to the cowl. Tighten to 115 to 140 in-lbs. (13 to 16 Nm).

note.para: Make sure the wiper pivot assembly weather seal is sealed properly on the cowl to prevent water leaking into the defroster duct.

step1.para: Position the wiper arm and blade (Item 5) at the wiper pivot assembly serrations (Item 3) so the park position of the blade pivot is 1.5 inches (38 mm) above the windshield weather seal. Push on tight. Reconnect the washer hose (Item 7) to the washer hose fitting (Item 6) on the wiper pivot assembly (Item 1).
Install the wiper motor. Refer to ELECTRIC WIPER MOTOR (COWL MOUNTED), Install.
